Bio

I'm a born and raised Vermonter, currently in my junior year at the University of Vermont where I'm studying political science and French. After class, I can be found at practice with the Lawrence Debate Union or representing UVM's chapter of the Yale-founded, " Every Vote Counts ."

Web-development has really taken my heart; its sharability and strong community make it for me. I'm interested in using the JAMstack and focusing on user experience.

If you'd like to make something happen, definitely reach out!

Projects
